price: 5. « Seigneur, (dit-il plus tard), je n’ai fait qu’exhorter mon peuple nuit et jour,
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوۡتُ قَوۡمِي لَيۡلٗا وَنَهَارٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī daʿawtu qawmī laylan wanahāran
